headline.main: Canucks Edge Kings 4-3 to End 4-Game Losing Streak
headline.print_headline: Canucks Edge Kings 4-3 to End 4-Game Losing Streak

lead_paragraph: Nikolay Goldobin assumed his first goal with the Vancouver Canucks would simply cap off a comfortable win in his debut for his new team. It proved to be far more valuable than that.
snippet: Nikolay Goldobin assumed his first goal with the Vancouver Canucks would simply cap off a comfortable win in his debut for his new team. It proved to be far more valuable than that....
